long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Amazeballs is an interesting game right on the chrome extension with simple gameplay and interesting levels. By moving to pass the maze, using the left and right arrows to move the ball, you will win at the finish line and advance to the next level.
